name: Mama Bird: Licky
description:
Oh no! Mama bird hasn’t any wings. But she has a more stronger weapon: “His Tongue”. Lick everything to move around and feed your babies. Protect them against wild cats and keep them alive. 

Left click to roam and grab objects with your tongue, eat worms and vomit them to your babies with right click. Use space key for scare wild cats. Keep your babies full and away from cats.

Totally Made by SessizLeylek for Ludum Dare 46
